aboutSection.title: ABOUT ME
aboutSection.subtitle: Who I am?
aboutSection.description: My name is Junnot Daniel, and I’m a passionate and dedicated programmer. I thrive on learning and exploring new technologies, with a strong self-driven attitude toward growth. Problem-solving excites me, and I’m deeply committed to making the web more accessible and open to everyone. My expertise lies in JavaScript, which I use extensively across various aspects of web application development—a field I truly enjoy. I am open to job opportunities that align with my skills and interests, and I look forward to contributing to meaningful projects.
